snippet: Bullpen catcher Eric Langill was arrested on drunken-driving charges; Tim Byrdak is having knee surgery; and the former Met Jason Pridie was suspended after a second positive drug test.
abstract: New York Mets get a string of bad news, with bullpen catcher Eric Langill being arrested on drunken-driving charges, pitcher Tim Byrdak having knee surgery and former Met Jason Pridie being suspended after a second positive drug test.
lead_paragraph: Bullpen catcher Eric Langill was arrested on drunken-driving charges; Tim Byrdak is having knee surgery; and the former Met Jason Pridie was suspended after a second positive drug test.

headline.seo: Mets Pack a Lot of Troubles Into Two Days
headline.main: Mets Pack a Whole Lot of Troubles Into 2 Days
headline.print_headline: Mets Pack A Whole Lot Of Troubles Into 2 Days
